messages.message:
I have been getting email like this.
The link has 127.0.0.1. Curious who is doing this or is this from cron job?
Got 3 of these in the past 24 hours

As the admin of the workspace where the drive is mounted and indexing is enabled, the indexing process runs on a scheduled Kubernetes cron job. Once the indexing is complete, all organization admins are expected to receive an email notification—this is the intended behavior.

That said, the URL in the email appears to be broken. I’ll take care of fixing it!
Probably related to the bug bash we did in AI Hub sandbox yesterday for the OneDrive connector.
